welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mansfield, where small-town charm meets rich history and natural beauty. Enjoy exploring our quaint downtown, scenic parks, and vibrant arts scene. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lahm Municipal Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lahm Municipal Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galion Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Galion Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Guests can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
